hero.subtitle: Connect with expert tutors who are passionate about helping you succeed. Whether it's math, science, languages, or any other subject, we've got you covered.
hero.trusted: Trusted by students from leading institutions

features.title: Everything you need to excel in your studies.
features.subtitle: Our platform provides all the tools and features you need to connect with expert tutors and achieve your academic goals.

findTutor.title: Find Your Perfect Tutor
findTutor.description: Browse through our extensive network of qualified tutors. Filter by subject, experience level, and availability to find your ideal match.

schedule.title: Schedule Sessions
schedule.description: Book sessions that fit your schedule. Our flexible booking system lets you plan ahead or schedule last-minute sessions when you need them.

interactive.title: Interactive Learning
interactive.description: Engage in real-time virtual sessions with screen sharing, whiteboard tools, and document collaboration features.

progress.title: Track Progress
progress.description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed progress reports, session history, and achievement milestones.

callToAction.title: Start your learning journey today
callToAction.subtitle: Join thousands of students who have already transformed their academic performance with our expert tutors.

testimonials.title: Trusted by students worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: Our platform has helped thousands of students achieve their academic goals

sarah.content: The tutoring platform helped me improve my grades significantly. The personalized attention from expert tutors made all the difference.
sarah.name: Sarah Chen

michael.content: As a working professional trying to learn new skills, the flexible scheduling and quality of tutors has been invaluable.
michael.name: Michael Rodriguez

emily.content: The interactive learning tools and patient tutors helped me finally understand calculus. I went from struggling to excelling.
emily.name: Emily Watson

david.content: Finding a qualified tutor used to be difficult, but this platform made it easy to connect with experts in my field.
david.name: David Kim

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Reach out to our support team via chat or email, and we'll get back to you promptly.

matching.summary: Our AI-powered system matches you with the perfect tutor for your needs.
matching.description: Using advanced algorithms, we analyze learning styles, academic goals, and scheduling preferences to connect you with tutors who best fit your requirements.
